title.native: 白い砂のアクアトープ

description:
Kukuru Misakino is a 18-year-old girl who works at an aquarium and she encounters a former idol who lost her place in Tokyo and escaped to Okinawa named Fuuka Miyazawa. Kukuru and Fuuka spend their days at the aquarium, their hearts filled with their own passions. But their precious place is about to be shut down forever. The girls face their dreams and reality, loneliness and friendships, bonds and conflicts... This summer is about to turn a glimmering, new page.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: The two girls met in the ruins of damaged dream
อควาโทปแห่งทรายขาว

node.description:

Frequent presence in [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/)' shows.

Affiliated with [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/) since 2009.

Debuted as a character designer on [Irozuku Sekai no Ashita kara](https://anilist.co/anime/101316/).

Affiliated with [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/) since 2009.

Debuted as a character designer on [Irozuku Sekai no Ashita kara](https://anilist.co/anime/101316/).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/東潤一)

Founder and representative director of Studio Easter.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/suzukikbg)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/108529192) | [Website](https://www.art-setting.com/) | [Nico Nico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/662388)
Handles special effects.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/haru0204)

[Twitter](https://x.com/naomi_nakano_8?t=du26TQSGyB-QUe8z-Iaqsg&s=09) | [Stella](https://stella-quartz.jp/)

Founder and president of Stella.
A Japanese arranger, composer, and member of the band [Jyukai](https://anilist.co/staff/100234/Jyukai).

ARCANA PROJECT is a 6-member girl's vocal unit jointly produces by Lantis and DEARSTAGE featuring tarot cards. Mia_REGINA directs songs and dances. 
They made their debut on January 18, 2020, followed by their first organized live "ACE of CUPS" named after minor arcana.

The outfits are based on common design with personalized detail.

Two of them have just joined to DS Gaming Team to appear at eSports contests as well.

They released their pre-debut single ACE of WANDS on March 25, 2020. Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, all release events in March are canceled.

Currently they are performing occasionally at LINELIVE as a whole or part where membership is available instead of appearing at live house due to stayhome situation.

They have proudly announced that they will perform the opening theme for the Monster Girl Doctor Anime which will be airing on 2020 summer. They will release the song as their first single named カンパネラ響く空で(Campanella Hibiku Sora de)
Members: Waka Kirishima (霧島若歌), Fuuri Uebana (上花楓裏), Risuko Sasakama (ささかまリス子)

__[Website](https://kusanokayoko.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayoko225)__

__Kayoko Kusano__, alternatively known by stage name Kayoko, is a Japanese guitarist, vocalist, lyricist, composer and arranger.

__[Website](https://kusanokayoko.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kayoko225)__

__Kayoko Kusano__, alternatively known by stage name Kayoko, is a Japanese guitarist, vocalist, lyricist, composer and arranger.
Masato Nakayama is a composer and former member of the music production group Elements Garden.

__Birthplace:__ Toyonaka, Japan
__Height:__ 159cm

_Risa Aizawa_ is a Japanese idol who is the leader of [Dempagumi.inc](https://anilist.co/staff/155222/Dempagumiinc) and part of the unit _LAVILITH_. She was a soloist from 2009 to 2012.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erizabes1012)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lsj_tomato) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5276533)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/osamu_sakata)
Affiliated with [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
